comment: The determinant of a square matrix with one row replaced with 0's and an arbitrary element of the underlying ring at the diagonal position equals the ring element multiplied with the determinant of a submatrix of the square matrix obtained by removing the row and the column at the same index. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2019.)
